data.title: School of Drama
data.meta_description: Paul Davis is a partner at Calleri Jensen Davis (www.callerijensendavis.com) where he casts for theater, television and film. Paul started his career in casting
data.text:
Profile

Paul Davis is a partner at Calleri Jensen Davis (www.callerijensendavis.com) where he casts for theater, television and film. Paul started his career in casting as the Assistant on the Broadway revivals of Annie Get Your Gun and Chicago. He subsequently worked with Mark Simon Casting, and later at USA Films and Focus Features. On his own, Paul cast The Crumple Zone for Jason Moore, the Obie-winning A Very Merry Unauthorized Children’s Scientology Pageant for Alex Timbers and Kyle Jarrow, as well as God’s Ear for New Georges and The Vineyard. Prior to partnering with Calleri and Jensen full time, Paul cast commercials and short films with Stacy Gallo. His professional teaching appointments include The New School, Syracuse University’s Tepper Semester, and Brooklyn College. Davis holds a BA in Drama from UC Irvine. Proud member of Casting Society of America.

Awards And Honors

6 Artios Awards for Excellence in Casting
